A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lot's of good actors\, but a bad depiction of luke skywalker as a cowardly old man needing to be prodded into correcting the situation he created or at least failed to clearly prevent. Too many plot holes\, and why the hell would finn be trying to escape again?? that didn't make any sense whatsoever\, among other silly things that got half-assed developed regarding finn and his triangle love interest.. ugh.  Love finn\, should have made him a jedi...  One of the worst star wars movies. i doubt i'll be rushing out to see any further installments\, and i've seen all of them.
